content.text: Match ends, Chelsea 5, Sunderland 1.
Second Half ends, Chelsea 5, Sunderland 1.
Goal!  Chelsea 5, Sunderland 1. Michy Batshuayi (Chelsea) left footed shot from the right side of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas.
Goal!  Chelsea 4, Sunderland 1. Michy Batshuayi (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Pedro with a through ball.
Attempt missed. César Azpilicueta (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Pedro.
Substitution, Sunderland. Darron Gibson replaces Lee Cattermole.
Attempt missed. Willian (Chelsea) left footed shot from the left side of the box is too high. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas.
Attempt blocked. Michy Batshuayi (Chelsea) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Pedro.
Michy Batshuayi (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Lee Cattermole (Sunderland).
Attempt blocked. Victor Moses (Chelsea) left footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by César Azpilicueta.
Lee Cattermole (Sunderland) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Pedro (Chelsea).
Attempt saved. Michy Batshuayi (Chelsea) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Pedro.
Michy Batshuayi (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Lee Cattermole (Sunderland).
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Jordan Pickford (Sunderland) because of an injury.
Goal!  Chelsea 3, Sunderland 1. Pedro (Chelsea) header from the left side of the six yard box to the centre of the goal.
Attempt missed. Pedro (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Willian following a corner.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Javier Manquillo.
Substitution, Chelsea. Pedro replaces Eden Hazard.
Attempt missed. Michy Batshuayi (Chelsea) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Eden Hazard.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Jack Rodwell.
Offside, Sunderland. Sebastian Larsson tries a through ball, but Javier Manquillo is caught offside.
Foul by Fabio Borini (Sunderland).
David Luiz (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Gary Cahill (Chelsea).
Fabio Borini (Sunderland) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Sunderland. Lynden Gooch replaces Adnan Januzaj.
Substitution, Chelsea. Michy Batshuayi replaces Diego Costa.
Goal!  Chelsea 2, Sunderland 1. Eden Hazard (Chelsea) left footed shot from the left side of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Diego Costa following a fast break.
Foul by Joleon Lescott (Sunderland).

Foul by Bryan Oviedo (Sunderland).

Attempt missed. Victor Moses (Chelsea) left footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas.
Attempt saved. Jack Rodwell (Sunderland) header from very close range is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Sebastian Larsson with a cross.
Corner,  Sunderland. Conceded by Marcos Alonso.
